cases.title: Composite coaching glimpses
cases.description: Stories merged from graduates and early-career professionals to keep individuals anonymous.

items.title: First role decision
items.context: A final-year student held offers in two cities and felt pressure from family to choose stability over curiosity.
items.coaching_moves: We clarified values, modelled cost-of-living scenarios and practised boundary conversations at home.
items.shift: They selected a role aligned with learning goals and communicated the decision with confidence.

items.title: Settling into probation
items.context: A graduate in a hybrid consultancy struggled to ask for feedback during the first 90 days.
items.coaching_moves: We rehearsed feedback requests, co-designed weekly reflection prompts and mapped support allies.
items.shift: They reported clearer expectations and calmer check-ins with their manager.

items.title: Reframing rejection
items.context: A STEM graduate experienced repeated final-round rejections and questioned their direction.
items.coaching_moves: We analysed interview data, experimented with informational chats and rebuilt replenishing routines.
items.shift: They regained momentum, secured supportive mentors and kept wellbeing front of mind.
